sentences.en: All motion in this universe is in the form of successively rising and falling.
sentences.cn: 在这个宇宙内的一切运动,都是处在连续上升和下降的状态中.

sentences.en: At every two feet which the hole gained in depth they successively withdrew the blocks.
sentences.cn: 每次掘到二英尺深,他们就陆陆续续地把支架抽出来.

sentences.en: Because of his good public image he has successively gained office.
sentences.cn: 由于他在公众中的良好形象,他已连续竞选获胜.

sentences.en: Before receiving a batch of fresh one, the solids in the three stages are successively dumped.
sentences.cn: 在接受一批新鲜矿石之前, 三层反应器中的固体颗粒连续往下落.

sentences.en: Coal is heated to successively higher temperatures in fluidized beds.
sentences.cn: 煤在流化床中逐层加热到更高的温度.

sentences.en: Diana won five championships in women's high jump successively in the five years.
sentences.cn: 戴安娜在五年内连续获得五次女子跳高冠军称号.

sentences.en: He successively held the posts of brigade and army commander.
He thought of it all day long and for many days successively.
sentences.cn: 他整天思考这个问题,而且一连几天都在想它.

sentences.en: I have been successively implanting in the man I was the characters I created.
sentences.cn: 我—直不曾停止过在这个人身上灌输这种观念:我就是我创造的那些人物.

sentences.en: It successively builds a sequence of lobes.
sentences.cn: 它连续地建成一系列叶状体。

sentences.en: Our team turned the tables in the last five minutes by scoring two goals successively.
sentences.cn: 我队在最后五分钟内连进两球,反败为胜.

sentences.en: The people who settled the town called successively Terminus , Marthasville and Atlanta, were a pushy people.
sentences.cn: 在这个先后叫做特米尔纳斯、马撒斯维尔和亚特兰大的市镇落户的人, 都是很有闯劲的.

sentences.en: The resulting framework is composed of 12 items, which are successively described.
sentences.cn: 导致的框架由12个项目组成, 这被连续描述.

sentences.en: The school team won five games successively.
To increase the overall probability of success, divide a behavior into parts and learn each part successively.
sentences.cn: 为以增加总体成功的可能性，可以把一个行为分成若干个部分并相继地学习每一个部分。

words.tran_cn: 连续的；继承的；依次的；接替的

trans.tran_cn: 接连着，继续地，递，先后，依次
